companies.name: Goodles
companies.reason: Goodles, a mac and cheese brand, raised $13 million to enhance its market presence. The company aims to differentiate itself with unique flavors and healthier options in a category that's traditionally seen as unhealthy.

companies.name: Vitto by Atlante Srl
companies.reason: Atlante Srl recently launched its Vitto-branded legume cup soups, which are marketed as easy-to-consume, portable meals that meet the growing demand for convenient and healthy food options.

companies.name: Elma Farms
companies.reason: This Miami-based startup focuses on providing affordable healthy snacks. Recently selected to join Endeavor's global network, Elma Farms is gaining recognition for its innovative approach in the snack industry.
